attributes.action: think about solutions other than new / increased taxes and bans
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This government only seems to have two actions. Either it introduces new taxes or it imposes bans on normal everyday things.
Recent bans are completely unnecessary, especially the ones that have banned activities that have been in existence for centuries (and still allowed in almost all other countries). 
Where do all these new taxes go?
What about some actual _positive_ action and a move away from the desire to control people's private lives?
